main event: Observers reported seeing a circular aircraft approximately 22 feet in diameter in Medway, Ohio on July 2-4, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as hanging motionless in the sky, It appeared dull silvery or gray in color and was not shiny, The observers noted the object moved behind other objects, The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes, The object was concluded to be a probable aircraft.
sighted object: circular aircraft similar to 22 feet in diameter
witness description: name and address redacted, age 77, male
